Player History
Drafted in 4th round, 66th overall pick, by Milwaukee in 1965...
Had first career hit on 6/16/1966, off Bill Edgerton (CHC)...
Earned first career win on 6/20/1966...
Injured on 8/22/1966 with a Torn Bicep Muscle, out for 5-6 weeks...
Injured on 6/9/1969 with a Herniated Disc Back, out for 5 weeks...
Hit first career homerun on 9/27/1970, off Von McDaniel (STL)...
Was selected to the 1973 Allstar game...
Was selected to the 1975 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1975, going 7-0, 1.15...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 9/1/1975, going 6-0, 2.21...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1976, going 5-1, 0.69...
Was selected to the 1976 Allstar game...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1976, going 6-0, 0.76...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 7/1/1978, going 4-2, 1.17...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 8/1/1978, going 6-0, 1.17...
Won Player of the Week award on 4/28/1979, winning 2 games with a 0.00 ERA...
Injured on 6/1/1979 with a Ruptured Tricep Tendon, out for 4 weeks...
Traded from Atlanta to Los Angeles on 5/1/1980 (Going to ATL: 3B W. Boggs, CF R. Henderson, 2B M. Barrett, P R. St. Claire. Going to LA: P B. Dillman, C B. Downing)...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 6/1/1980, going 4-1, 1.52...
Injured on 8/3/1980 with a Strained Tricep Tendon, out for 2 weeks...
Won Pitcher of the Month award on 10/1/1981, going 5-1, 0.99...
